title: De-Risking Discoveries
description:
In this course, students will explore the types of risks
encountered in the TM continuum and the implications
for patients, researchers, funders, and society. Strategies
for reducing risks will be examined through case-based
analyses.
prerequisite:
GMS 5801: Translational Medicine: From Unmet Need to Cure
GMS 5802: From Need to Target
corequisite: GMS 5805: Entrepreneurship for Translational Medicine Researchers
